text: His Honour Judge Sir Gavyn Farr Arthur KStJ GCFO (13 September 1951 - 16 May 2016) was a British judge. He served as the 675th Lord Mayor from 2002 to 2003. He served as Alderman for the Ward of Cripplegate in the City from his election in 1991 until 2005. Arthur died from a heart attack in London on 16 May 2016, aged 64. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Alumni of the University of Oxford Category:English judges Category:Deputy mayors Category:Mayors of London Category:People educated at Harrow School
title: Gavyn Farr Arthur
